text: Wo que yi jiang shi “tao la te”, qizhong you xiangdao he guangming, guishun zhenzhu de zhong xianzhi, ceng yizhao ta ti youtaijiaotu jinxing panjue, yiban mingzhe he boshi, ye yizhao tamen suo fengming huchi de tian jing er panjue, bing wei qi jianzheng, gu nimen buyao weiju ren, dang weiju wo, buyao yi wo de jixiang qu huanqu xiewei de daijia. Shui buyizhao zhenzhu suo jiang shi de jingdian er panjue, shui shi bu xindao de ren.
